true by default. set to false if you are creating a dev type envt. this will allow some flows to set target users to the admin instead of object owners
An individual admin's email. Some actions (approvals / team chats) cannot accept a group/DL. So this env variable is for those instances in the kit.

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: Orphaned Power Platform objects without managers
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Hello, there are Power Platform objects in your tenant who's owner has left the company and so they are orphaned.

We have sent these to the former manager for those that are known, but there are a set for whom we do not have a manager on file.

Please clean these up via the Set App Permissions and Set Flow Permissions apps from your CoE.

APPS
@{body('Create_HTML_table_of_apps_for_admins')}

FLOWS
@{body('Create_HTML_table_of_flows_for_admins')}

parameters.PostNotificationRequest/messageBody: Thank you for helping keep the tenant tidy. We will return with any remaining or new orphans to clean.

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: Orphaned Power Platform objects - managers who ignored requests to clean
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Hello, there are Power Platform objects in your tenant who's owner has left the company and so they are orphaned.

We have sent these to the former manager for those that are known, but these managers did not respond to the request to clean.

If you see them persistenty ignoring the request you may need to reach out in some other manner.

@{body('Create_HTML_table_of_Ignoring_Managers')}
